1.content:
A large, low to the ground billboard is the first thing seen in Anthroickle. Each letter is the pattern of a different animal. The E even has a dragons tail in it. The city looms not far away. Suburbs surrounded most of the city. A rural and forest area covered a small quarter. Sky scrapers towered dead center of the city.

Laughter can be heard all over the place. From buildings, cars. Heck even in the park. Used as prizes and punishments. Kids using it in games. Several national sports are nothing but tickling!

Furs and scales wander freely. Some by car, some by bike, some by flight, some by paw. But what about you? Are you a native of the town? Or are you brand new? (Brand new go to immigration)
1.title: The city

11.content:
Name: Cielly Daragno

Age: 24

Species: Dragon

Appearance: Cielly stands about 25 feet tall. Covered in red and purple scales from head to toe. Two semi large wings on his back and a 5 foot tail. Normally he wears a t shirt, jeans and red high tops. He has a tendency of wearing knee high socks as well. It's quite hard for him to find clothes that fit him.

Personality: A fun spirited guy. Loves to joke around. He's protective of those he cares about but isn't afraid to screw with those around him.

Adult: yes

Ticklishness: 12

Enjoy tickling?: yep

Tickle spots: Everywhere. Just not all spots are easy to reach with him being so large.

Other info: Cielly loves being on the recieving end. In all honesty, he gets jealous of others. Being so big, most just run in the other direction. So when ever he picks on someone, it's in hopes that they will attack him.
11.title: Cielly

14.content:
Name: Duskero "Dusky"

Age:20

Species: Anthro Wolf

Appearance: Mostly dark blue fur with light purple fur on his belly, paws and tail. Normally wears a black tshirt and jeans with purple and blue high tops. Always wearing rainbow knee highs. Dark blue eyes, 5'10", athletic build.

Personality: Rather outgoing and friendly. A bit too friendly. He has a tendency to walk into ticklish situations blindly. But don't be fooled. He loves being tickled.

Adult: Yep

Ticklishness: 9

Enjoy tickling: Definetly

Tickle spots: EVERYWHERE
14.title: Dusky

choices: "How abut you show me around town?"
"How about we go and get some lunch?"
143.content:
Dusky happens to be walking around town getting a feel for his new home when he happens upon a fox that look about the same age as him, the fox takes notice of him and says "You must be the new resident, Dusky right?" He asks holding out his hand for a handshake as Dusky nods and returns it.

"Name's Jackson but please just call me Foxy." The fox now known as Foxy chuckles getting a laugh out of Dusky in the process, "So what were you doing before ya bumped into me?" He asks as Dusky begins to explain "Well, I was just walking around town getting a feel for the place."

Foxy shrugs in response as he says "I hear that! How about I show you the rest of the town? That'd give us something to do to pass the time." Foxy asks as Dusky raises an eyebrow, "Speaking of that; What time is it?" At that statement Foxy checks his watch which reads 2:10. "Let's see it's 10 past 2 so we can stop and get some lunch if your hungry?"

Dusky mulls the options over in his head till he says..
143.title: Meeting a new friend

15.content:
The first place most visit as they arrive. An office, 3 story building. But yet, even upon entering there is laughter all over the place. Two signs hang in front of a fork in the hallway. One reads for males and the other, females. Dead center was another sign. One that certainly answers the laughter mystery. It reads that if you don't know how ticklish you are or where, you'll soon know.

For entry, fill out the application and give an intro if you wish. Application is mandatory.
15.title: Immigration office

info.brief_description: Anthros and tickling. What more could you ask for?
info.description:
Welcome one and all to the marvelous world of......


Anthroickle


Please watch your step. We have guest of all shapes and sizes. From your average wolf, to as large as a dragon and as small as a mouse. But fear not! Hostility is a thing of the past here!

For you new comers the rules are simple and are as follows:

Laws of Anthroickle


1. You shall not harm one another

2. Tickling is not only loved. It is encouraged!

3. Romance is only restricted by pedophilia. If they are too young then paws off! No rape either!

4. Sexual content is the same as romance. Those found guilty will be removed from Anthroickle.

5. You must have fun!

6. Please make your additions decently long.

7. Must me Anthro! I don't care if it's an Anthro spider. You just better be Anthro.


Not so complicated right? I hope not anyways!

Now then within you will find several natives. But there is also a new comers section for creating your own character! The required info is as shown:

Anthroickle Resume


Name

Age

Species

Appearance

Personality

Adult (must be 18)

Ticklishness (1-10)

Do you enjoy tickling?

Tickle spots

Other info



Welcome to Anthroickle
